text: @realDonaldTrump First of all, our country isn’t beautiful since you came on board, second the enemy isn’t invisible it’s called the  COVID19 or MORONAVIRUS ( since you have it) and third we will open the nation when the time is right and NOT a moment sooner just because you say so! GO AWAY!
